item.title: 游리 10:52 Fragrant anxiety in the Dnipropetrovsk region. Find out, anxiety is still in:- Marganets and Marganets Territorial Community- Chervonohrigor Territorial Community
item.description: 游리 10:52 Fragrant anxiety in the Dnipropetrovsk region. Find out, anxiety is still in:- Marganets and Marganets Territorial Community- Chervonohrigor Territorial Community#Dnipropetrovsk_. This is a warning from the official Ukrainian Air Monitoring System and may indicate a potential or imminent airstrike or other threat.
